amendatorysection.para: The functions of the commission shall be to:
(1) Promote state and federal legislation beneficial to the Indian community in Nebraska;
(4) Keep the Governor's office apprised of the situation in the Indian community;
(6) Provide the public with information and education relevant to Indian affairs in the State of Nebraska; and
(7) Develop programs to encourage the total involvement of Indian people in activities for the common benefit of the Indian community.
